description: This file defines the S3Object class, which represents an Amazon S3 object resource. It includes methods for generating the object's URI, retrieving the resource, and downloading the object to a local path.

classes.name: S3Object
classes.description: Represents an Amazon S3 object with methods to access its URI, retrieve the resource, and download it.

methods.name: uri
methods.description: Returns the URI of the S3 object in the format s3://bucket_name/key.

methods.name: get_resource
methods.description: Retrieves the S3 object resource using the provided or default AWS client.

methods.name: download
methods.description: Downloads the S3 object to a specified local path.
